A leaked listing for a deluxe edition of Batman: Arkham Origins Blackgate has been spotted on the XBLA marketplace, along with a handful of new screenshots.

"Batman: Arkham Origins Blackgate - Deluxe Edition amplifies the 2.5-D game with new maps, enemy encounters, difficulty levels, batsuits, and enhanced visuals," says the game description on the XBLA marketplace listing. It's due for release on March 25, and will have support for online features such as leaderboards.

blackgatexbla53lh5

Below are the images included in the gallery, though an enterprising NeoGAF user has saved the images in case the XBLA listing gets taken down.

Blackgate was originally released on PS Vita and the 3DS; in our review, we thought that it was a fairly decent extension of the Batman series for mobile devices.
